SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, D.*, F.IDX FILE_NAME FROM USV_NOTICE D, (SELECT IDX FROM USV_ATTACHMENT GROUP BY IDX) F WHERE D.IDX = F.IDX(+) AND D.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND ( BODY_TEXT LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR TITLE_TEXT LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR WRITE_ID = '%${searchKeyword}%' )
ORDER BY D.IDX DESC ) M )
WHERE RNUM > #{firstIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT IDX ,TITLE_TEXT ,BODY_TEXT ,WRITE_ID ,TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DATE ,EDIT_ID ,TO_CHAR(EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EDIT_DATE ,HIT FROM USV_NOTICE WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE USV_NOTICE SET HIT = HIT+1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
